means: 蹒跚而行，拖着脚走，踉跄地走( shamble的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: People turned to look after him , so uncouth was his shambling figure.
sentence.Network_cn: “有什么用呢?"他想, "我已经全完了.我要摆脱这一切了.

sentence.Network_en: He was hollow - chested, squint - eyed, and rather shambling, but spry enough withal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他胸膛低陷, 眼睛斜视, 步履蹒跚, 但又着实生气勃勃.

sentence.Network_en: The shambling of his angular figure now directed him to a lean - to.
sentence.Network_cn: 他瘦削的身子踉踉跄跄地朝那间披屋走去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: one day he saw Lincoln-a tall , shambling man , long , bony , gawky , but tremendously impressive .有一天，他见到了林肯，一个步态蹒跚的高个子。他又瘦又长，显得腼腆，但给人的印象极为深刻。
one day he saw Lincoln - a tall , shambling man , long , bony , gawky , but tremendously impressive .有一天他看见了林肯——一个脚步踉跄的高个子,又瘦又长,行动笨拙,但给人极其深刻的印象.

list.abs: the meeting ended in a complete shambles ., 会议结束时混乱不堪.
My body ' s in shambles encrusted with brambles that sharpen the air I breathe ., 我的身体在废墟镶嵌与荆棘的锐化我呼吸的空气.
the crafty sons of darkness shall squirm in discomfort as their ritual of lies fall in shambles in pile around their deadened feet .狡猾的黑暗小人s应该会很不舒服地蠕动，因为他们谎言大厦将倒塌成废墟在他们的瘫腿附近堆满瓦砾。
多音字烂摊子的汉英词典搜索结果，点击看详细... ... 烂摊子(烂摊子)[ làntānzi] 烂摊子 a shambles.
It was a shambles that the fire left the building ., 这场火灾使这座建筑物留下的是一片废墟.
he was hollow-chested , squint-eyed , and rather shambling , but spry enough withal .他胸膛低陷，眼睛斜视，步履蹒跚，但又着实生气勃勃。

entry.def: If you shamble somewhere, you walk clumsily, pulling your feet along the ground.

example.ex: The conductor shambled to the next carriage.
example.tran: 售票员慵懒地拖着脚走向下一节车厢。
他那高大而且步履蹒跚的背影

means.word_mean: 1. walking with a slow dragging motion without lifting your feet;

sentences.sentence: "from his shambling I assumed he was very old"

auth_sentence.content: Except that in the cluttered Homelife studio, the word 'basic' still means off-kilter, shambling, eccentric and half-kooked.

auth_sentence.content: This EP is a delicately recorded and deliberately shambling debut, its nostalgia attacked with a rare tenderness.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This EP is a delicately recorded and deliberately shambling debut, its nostalgia attacked with a rare tenderness.

auth_sentence.content: Many critics were won over by the band's lo-fi, shambling homeliness, while others could only see tweeness rearing its ugly head.
